thread.title: RIT Inn & Conference Center to host karate tournament
thread.title_full: RIT Inn & Conference Center to host karate tournament

title: RIT Inn & Conference Center to host karate tournament
text: RIT Inn & Conference Center to host karate tournament Comment Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 2:01 AM Posted Oct. 15, 2015 at 2:01 AM The RIT Inn & Conference Center, 5257 W. Henrietta Road, will host the 25th anniversary Kyokushin American International Karate Tournament on Oct. 24. The tournament is open to all styles and organizations, including empty hand, weapons, clicker, breaking, semi-full contact and knockdown fighting. Two seminars will precede the tournament from 6 to 7:30 p.m. for ages 13 and younger and from 8 to 9:30 p.m. for ages 14 and older on Oct. 23, focused on fighting strategy and conditioning. The cost is $15. For more information, call 585-663-7680 or 585-489-5797. Brighton-Pittsford Post
